name: Batting
description: Learn the art of batting and improve your skills in various batting techniques and strategies.

name: Bowling
description: Master the art of bowling and develop your bowling techniques, variations, and control.

name: Fielding
description: Enhance your fielding skills, including catching, throwing, and agility in the field.

name: Fitness and Conditioning
description: Focus on improving fitness levels and overall conditioning to excel in cricket.

name: Tactical Awareness
description: Develop a strong understanding of cricket tactics, match awareness, and game strategies.

name: Match Practice
description: Engage in match scenarios and practice sessions to apply your skills in real-game situations.
